item.description:
for more info click here

Block 11 is a coffee house in Union Square. It is recommended that you purchase your tickets in advance.

From 6:30pm-12am join 7 musical acts along with free snacks and appetizers, plus a cash bar serving beer and wine. All Ages to attend, 21 to drink.

One Happy Island- Indie Pop www.onehappyislandmusic.com
Abbie Barrett- Folk & Jazz www.abbiebarrett.com
Audrey Ryan- Singer-songwriter www.audreyryan.org
Kevin Byrne- Irish and Country www.myspace.com/kevinbyrneband
Kristen Ford- Indie Rock www.kristenfordmusic.com
Charlie Cover- Blues www.facebook.com/charlie.cover
Colin Kelly- Americana www.reverbnation.com/colinthomaskelly

PRESALE TICKETS: http://www.brownpaper...

DISCLAIMER: Get there before 6PM if you plan on buying your ticket at the door. I cannot guarantee that you will get in if you arrive at 6PM. I do not accept text messages or phone call after the show has started.

COST: $8 all ages, 21 to drink, includes free apps and snacks.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a pink cap
item.name: Block 11 - Live Music Celebration (Union Square)
